chat-selector.label: Use JChat
chat-selector.info: You can change the underlying chat service here. Defaults to kapchat.

font-size.label: Font Size
font-size.info: Changes the size of the chat lines.

fade.label: Fade
fade.info: You can fade out old chat lines after a set number of seconds to keep stale content from remaining on screen.

show-bots.label: Show bots
show-bots.info: KapChat hides bot messages by default, but you can turn them back on.

hide-commands.label: Hide commands
hide-commands.info: Hides messages that start with a command character (e.g. !, /, .).

hide-badges.label: Hide special badges
hide-badges.info: Hides special badges from chat messages.

font.label: Chat Font
font.info: Changes the font of the chat text.

stroke.label: Stroke
stroke.info: Adds a stroke to the chat text.

shadow.label: Shadow
shadow.info: Adds a shadow to the chat text.

small-caps.label: Caps
small-caps.info: Converts chat text to all capital letters.

theme.label: Chat Theme
theme.info: Changes the color theme of the chat.

prevent-clipping.label: Prevent Clipping
prevent-clipping.info: You can prevent the clipping of chat lines, but it is disabled by default for performance reasons. If you have a large channel, you might not want to enable this.

user-blacklist.label: User Blacklist
user-blacklist.info: Enter a comma separated list of usernames to hide their messages from chat. (e.g. StreamElements, Nightbot)
